DOC.brief_title: Split-face Tolerability Comparison Between MetroGel® 1 % v Finacea® 15 % Subjects With Healthy Skin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female adult ( age 18 year old ) Subjects healthy skin determine clinical grader Subjects degree skin pigmentation interfere read skin reaction Subjects know allergy one component study drug ( refer package insert MetroGel® 1 % Finacea® Gel 15 % ) Subjects participate another investigational drug device research study within 30 day enrollment Subjects washout period topical treatment treat area le 1 week corticosteroid and/or 4 week retinoids Subjects washout period systemic treatment le 1 week medication may increase photosensitivity and/or 4 week corticosteroid and/or 6 month retinoids Subjects current sunburn , eczema , atopic dermatitis , perioral dermatitis , rosacea , topical condition area treat Subjects foresee unprotected intense UV exposure study ( mountain sport , UV radiation , sunbathe , etc . )
